mapper.insert: insert into review values((select nvl(max(RV_num), 0)+1 from review), #{RV_writer}, #{RV_reader}, #{RV_star}, #{RV_content}, #{RSV_num})
mapper.select: select * from review where RV_writer=#{RV_writer} and RV_reader=#{RV_reader} and RSV_num=#{RSV_num}
select r.*, m.MB_nickName from review r, member m where r.RV_writer=m.MB_num and RV_reader=#{MB_num} order by RV_num desc
select nvl(round(avg(RV_star), 1), 0) from review where RV_reader=#{MB_num}
